name: developer-roadmap
description: Ultra-comprehensive developer learning platform with 70+ roles, 7 specialized agents, and 28+ invokable skills. Master any technology through structured learning paths, hands-on projects, and expert guidance.
author: Claude Developer Learning Community

agents.name: Frontend & UI Development Specialist
agents.description: Expert in web frontend, UI frameworks, and design systems (12 roles)

agents.name: Backend & APIs Architect
agents.description: Specialized in server-side development and API design (10 roles)

agents.name: Data & AI/ML Engineer
agents.description: Expert in data pipelines, ML frameworks, and AI systems (8 roles)

agents.name: DevOps & Infrastructure Specialist
agents.description: Specialized in cloud, containerization, and infrastructure (8 roles)

agents.name: Database & Systems Architect
agents.description: Expert in database design, systems architecture, and scalability (8 roles)

agents.name: Mobile & Gaming Developer
agents.description: Specialized in iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, and game development (6 roles)

agents.name: Management & Specialized Roles
agents.description: Leadership, QA, security, blockchain, prompt engineering, and DevRel (9 roles)
